annotations.text: CDs quickly grew to dominate the market as they offered significantly better quality audio than previous ormats, whilst being compact, portable, writable and inexpensive.
annotations.comment: CDs quickly grew to dominate the market as they offered significantly better quality audio than previous ormats, whilst being compact, portable, writable and inexpensive.
annotations.unFormattedText: CDs quickly grew to dominate the market as they offered significantly better quality audio than previous ormats, whilst being compact, portable, writable and inexpensive.
annotations.formattedText: CDs quickly grew to dominate the market as they offered significantly better quality audio than previous ormats, whilst being compact, portable, writable and inexpensive.

annotations.text: The rise of piracy and the disruption caused by the emergence of the digital format eroded much of the music industry's impressive gains from the previous two decades.
annotations.comment: The rise of piracy and the disruption caused by the emergence of the digital format eroded much of the music industry's impressive gains from the previous two decades.
annotations.unFormattedText: The rise of piracy and the disruption caused by the emergence of the digital format eroded much of the music industry's impressive gains from the previous two decades.
annotations.formattedText: The rise of piracy and the disruption caused by the emergence of the digital format eroded much of the music industry's impressive gains from the previous two decades.

annotations.text:
After a devastating start to the new millennium, revenues are once again growing thanks to the arrival of streaming services and paid subscriptions.

Today, the American music industry makes 79% of its revenue, or $8.8B, from digital music.

chartCustomTitle.customTitle:
HOW MUSIC ENTERED THE DIGITAL ERA

Looking back at 40 years of sales in the American music industry

Areas in gray represent music sold in physical format, whereas areas in pink represent music sold in digital format.
